speaker: Bill Richardson
vclaim: New Mexico moved "up to" the sixth in the country in the growth of jobs.
date: stated on May 10, 2007 in a TV Ad.:
title: Yeah, but notice the microprint.
text: Richardson's right, but he doesn't remember beautiful printing. In developing its economic record as Governor of New Mexico, the Richardson campaign produced a television announcement indicating the rapid growth of jobs in the state while in office. Although the State ranked sixth in August 2006 in terms of job growth, it recently ranked fifteenth. A more precise statement is that the State "has ranked sixth in the nation." Berger, commander of the United States Navy, rejected Nancy Belusi's request for the use of marines for inaugural security, saying, "We are not working for you."
